sys_ui_macro.name: LetterNumber
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> <g:evaluate var="jvar_guid" expression="gs.generateGUID(this);" /> <j:set var="jvar_n" value="show_incidents_${jvar_guid}:${ref}"/> <button id="${jvar_n}" type="button" aria-haspopup="true" aria-label="${gs.getMessage('Remove 1 from Quantity')}" onclick="consume_1('${ref}')" name="${jvar_n}" class="btn btn-ref btn-default icon-remove" tabindex="$[jvar_ua_optional_tabindex]" title="${gs.getMessage('Remove 1 from Quantity')}"> </button>
</j:jelly>
